comments:
I did the following steps on build I20051213 on Linux Motif.

- create a project
- create a class (using Ctrl+n then choose class and go to next page)
- I had no packages in my Workspace and no other projects
- try Ctrl+space on the package field in new class wizard ... no result
- type in package name
- type in class name
- might have given focus to the Enclosing type field
- leave wizard to other app
- come back and focus is in the enclosing type field and the finish button (and others) are now disabled.

the following error was in the log:

It appears that under motif, sometimes a control may get a 'focusGained' event despite already having focus. This is certainly unexpected, and may also be the reason for the similar bug 141508.

traces.message: Assertion failed: parent control has CueHandler: Composite {}
